Listen » https://t.co/9OabkiILmF https://t.co/lGINkDNqw8

“I just want to improve my game all the time. Get stronger, get faster, get better at the small things in my game. I know I have some things to work on this summer and come back stronger next season.”

Anton Lundell » https://t.co/w1IKjD741N https://t.co/1azSIotPhg

“I think for myself it was a step in the right direction but I know I can still bring more to the table.”

Sam Bennett » https://t.co/M0wp1aQtGQ https://t.co/qBsgY7aNfs

“I have no negative thoughts on my decision to come here. It’s a fun place to play. I believe in this group. A lot of potential and a lot of good things to come for this organization.”

Claude Giroux » https://t.co/VhQ5PG75gq https://t.co/szFUx919hi

“I came here to win a championship and we fell short of that. I think the Florida Panthers are going to be good for a long time and it’s exciting around here now.”

Joe Thornton » https://t.co/BOn9DNmBEI https://t.co/vWMcX08YSy

“My mind is on one moment at a time, one day at a time. I want to build on [this season]. Get stronger, get better, and focus on the present. I see lots of potential in myself [still] and I don’t see limits.”

Sergei Bobrovsky » https://t.co/9XdSdTr2CG https://t.co/8ZYjTk927y

“We had a great regular season but our main goal, we didn’t reach. That’s disappointing for us. That’s what keeps us thinking about what we can do better, as a group and as individuals.”

Aleksander Barkov » https://t.co/dU8oKovCqh https://t.co/63D4UcRlFR
